name: House Cleaner Flipper
description:
It looks like your room is very messy, do not let your angry granny see it! Well, only a real helix could have made such a mess in your house and whole home design is buried under this mess, so become a house flipper in our mother simulator and clean the house before angry granny and grandpa will see it! Get rid of all rubbish from your house in our house flipper simulator and reestablish home design like it was before. We do not know which helix has made such a mess, but we sure, that your angry granny and grandpa should not see it, so clean everything before their arrival in our new simulator: House Cleaner Flipper. Do a little of your household chores in this mothers simulator and evade the wrath of your angry granny and grandpa in this mothers simulator, do not let them see your new home design!

In this mother simulator you will play as house flipper and your only target here is to get rid of all the mess from your house. Your new home design looks like some kind of a helix has occurred there lately, your angry granny and grandpa should not see it, so fix everything and resurrect your old home design before they arrive. Clean everything properly, real house flipper would not leave even a speck of dust, so make sure that there are no mess in your house. No one wants to have arguments with your angry granny and grandpa, so evade it in this house flipper simulator and wipe the mess out. If your house looks like a helix has occurred there, fix it and get rid of all rubbish, that is what you have to do in this mother simulator.

House Cleaner Flipper is a free to play mother simulator in which you have to reestablish your home design. Get rid of the mess in your house and clean everything before your angry granny and grandpa will see it. Become a house flipper in our simulator, make your home design look impeccable, and not like it was destroyed by a helix. Try out our new house flipper simulator and clean everything fast, do not forget that your angry granny and grandpa will not like mess in the house. Download our mother simulator and show them that you are doing your household chores properly.
